import './App.css'; import { useState } from 'react'; function App() { const [addRegistroVisivel, setAddRegistroVisivel] = useState(false); const [filtroVisivel, setFiltroVisivel] = useState(false); const [formulario, setFormulario] = useState({ valor: 0, categoria: '', data: '', descricao: '' }); function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); const { valor, categoria, data, descricao } = formulario; const form = { "date": data, "week_day": '', "description": descricao, "value": valor, "category": categoria, "type": 'credit' }; fetch("http://localhost:3333/transactions", { method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify(form) }); setAddRegistroVisivel(false); } function handleChange(event) { setFormulario({ ...formulario, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } function handleFiltro() { setFiltroVisivel((prevState) => { }) } return (
